messages.title: YOU SPEAK, I’LL LISTEN IN GARSTON & HALEWOOD
messages.content: Labour are out of touch. Too much spin and not enough accountability. You can’t complain if you’re not prepared to do something about it. That’s why I’m asking for your vote. Less political correctness and a plain speaking MP who listens.

messages.title: FIXING OUR BROKEN SOCIETY STARTS WITH SUPPORTING FAMILIES
messages.content: Iain Duncan Smith and I visited the Five Families Trust in Speke to see the excellent family work being undertaken. Their innovative approach is hugely impressive. I also discussed rebuilding the broken society on the BBC.

messages.title: SUPPORTING OUR PENSIONERS
messages.content: We will raise the basic state pension in line with earnings to help stop the spread of the means test. I am committed to creating more personalisation in health care and the introduction of a home protection scheme.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Richard Downey understands that violent crime is up under Labour yet police officers spend more time on paperwork than they do on patrol. We cut bureaucracy to get more officers on the beat in our neighbourhood.

issues.health: I am committed to creating more personalisation in health care.

housing.content: the introduction of a home protection scheme.

images.caption: LEFT: FIXING OUR BROKEN SOCIETY STARTS WITH SUPPORTING FAMILIES
RIGHT: TACKLING CRIME IS THE NUMBER ONE ISSUE
